name: df-0g
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(c0g, cmpt(s0, universe, cio(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wral(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wa(wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), cv(s2)), wceq(co(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(s2))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ 0 =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ iota(s1,(s1 ‚àà(Base ` s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(Base ` s0),((s1[(+ ` s0)]s2)= s2 ‚àß(s2[(+ ` s0)]s1)= s2)))))
comment: Define group identity element. Remark: this definition is required here because the symbol ` 0g ` is already used in ~ df-gsum . The related theorems are provided later, see ~ grpidval . (Contributed by NM, 20-Aug-2011.)
